data.name: Aetherize
data.oracle_text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

data.name: Aetherspouts
data.oracle_text: For each attacking creature, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
data.flavor_text:
"Don't worry, there's plenty for everyone."
—Vickon, Eleventh Company battlemage

data.name: Aggravate
data.oracle_text: Aggravate deals 1 damage to each creature target player controls. Each creature dealt damage this way attacks this turn if able.
data.flavor_text:
"Barbarians! They burned my favorite chair! We'll kill them all!"
—Anje Falkenrath

data.name: Akroma's Vengeance
data.oracle_text:
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Ixidor had only to imagine their ruin and Akroma made it so.

data.name: Akroma's Vengeance
data.oracle_text:
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: "Many must die for the one who should not have perished."

data.name: Alpha Brawl
data.oracle_text: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to each other creature that player controls, then each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to that creature.
data.flavor_text: Being an alpha means proving it every full moon.

data.name: Anger of the Gods
data.oracle_text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.

data.name: Anger of the Gods
data.oracle_text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text:
"Toralf struck the ground with his hammer, and the force of a thousand storms tore through the demonic horde."
—Birgi, god of storytelling

data.name: Anger of the Gods
data.oracle_text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: Eating those clerics might have been a bad idea.

data.name: Anger of the Gods
data.oracle_text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

data.name: Arcbond
data.oracle_text: Choose target creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage this turn, it deals that much damage to each other creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"If you must die today, make your death worthy of legend."
—Alesha, Who Smiles at Death

data.name: Arms of Hadar
data.oracle_text: Creatures target player controls get -2/-2 until end of turn.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text: Burning slowly into annihilation, the elder evil Hadar grants fearsome powers to warlocks willing to help satiate its dark hunger.

data.name: Austere Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

data.name: Austere Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

data.name: Baki's Curse
data.oracle_text: Baki's Curse deals 2 damage to each creature for each Aura attached to that creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Those who fling spells too quickly should have reason to regret it."
—Baki, Wizard Attendant

data.name: Barrage of Boulders
data.oracle_text:
Barrage of Boulders deals 1 damage to each creature you don't control.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, creatures can't block this turn.
data.flavor_text: Crude tactics can be effective nonetheless.

data.name: Begin Anew
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. Creature cards in your hand perpetually get +1/+1.

data.name: Bite of the Black Rose
data.oracle_text: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for sickness or psychosis. If sickness gets more votes, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. If psychosis gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent discards two cards.

data.name: Biting Rain
data.oracle_text:
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
data.flavor_text: On Innistrad, it is seldom wrong to stay indoors.

data.name: Black Sun's Zenith
data.oracle_text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
data.flavor_text:
"Under the suns, Mirrodin kneels and begs us for perfection."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

data.name: Black Sun's Zenith
data.oracle_text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

data.name: Blasphemous Act
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

data.name: Blazing Volley
data.oracle_text: Blazing Volley deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
data.flavor_text:
"Don't ask me what to do if you miss. They're stingdrakes. Don't miss."
—Orthion, Lavabrink captain

data.name: Blazing Volley
data.oracle_text: Blazing Volley deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
data.flavor_text: The arrows fell like fiery rain, and for a moment, the sky itself seemed to burn.

data.name: Bloodline Culling
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
• Creature tokens get -2/-2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Forget your human ancestors. You're part of my family now."

data.name: Blood Money
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. For each nontoken creature destroyed this way, you create a tapped Treasure token.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text: For the patriar class, wealth is in the blood.

data.name: Blood on the Snow
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all planeswalkers.
Then return a creature or planeswalker card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

data.name: Boiling Earth
data.oracle_text:
Boiling Earth deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
Awaken 4—{6}{R} (If you cast this spell for {6}{R}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

data.name: Bonfire of the Damned
data.oracle_text:
Bonfire of the Damned deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
Miracle {X}{R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

data.name: Bontu's Last Reckoning
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.
data.flavor_text: To the last, Bontu wanted only to be first among the God-Pharaoh's subjects.

data.name: Borrowing the East Wind
data.oracle_text: Borrowing the East Wind deals X damage to each creature with horsemanship and each player.

data.name: Breaking Point
data.oracle_text: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to them. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: "Enough!"

data.name: Breath of Darigaaz
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

data.name: Breath Weapon
data.oracle_text: Breath Weapon deals 2 damage to each non-Dragon creature.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text: "In the name of Tempus, Lord of Battles, you will die honorably in righteous fire."

data.name: Burn Down the House
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Burn Down the House deals 5 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
• Create three 1/1 red Devil creature tokens with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target." They gain haste until end of turn.

data.name: Burning of Xinye
data.oracle_text: You destroy four lands you control, then target opponent destroys four lands they control. Then Burning of Xinye deals 4 damage to each creature.

data.name: By Invitation Only
data.oracle_text: Choose a number between 0 and 13. Each player sacrifices that many creatures.
data.flavor_text: The red envelopes guarantee safe passage through the Lurenbraum barrier. Olivia left strict instructions: no invitation, no entry, no exceptions.

data.name: Canopy Surge
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Canopy Surge deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature with flying and each player instead.

data.name: Cataclysm
data.oracle_text: Each player chooses from among the permanents they control an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.
data.flavor_text: The *Weatherlight* dragged the *Predator* behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.

data.name: Cataclysm
data.oracle_text: Each player chooses from among the permanents they control an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.
data.flavor_text:
"Keep with you only this much: your mount, your blade, and your wits. The rest you can find, build, or take."
—Horse clans' wisdom

data.name: Catastrophe
data.oracle_text: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."

data.name: Cave-In
data.oracle_text:
You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Cave-In deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: One fleet was gone; others were poised.

data.name: Celestial Judgment
data.oracle_text: For each different power among creatures on the battlefield, choose a creature with that power. Destroy each creature not chosen this way.
data.flavor_text:
"I was going to suggest silver, but a beam of pure angelic fury works even better."
—Rem Karolus, Fiendslayer

data.name: Cerebral Eruption
data.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals the top card of their library. Cerebral Eruption deals damage equal to the revealed card's mana value to that player and each creature that player controls. If a land card is revealed this way, return Cerebral Eruption to its owner's hand.

data.name: Chain Reaction
data.oracle_text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
data.flavor_text:
"We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."
—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

data.name: Chandra's Flame Wave
data.oracle_text: Chandra's Flame Wave deals 2 damage to target player and each creature that player controls. Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Chandra, Flame's Fury, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
data.flavor_text: "It's high tide."

data.name: Chandra's Fury
data.oracle_text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
data.flavor_text: www.MagicTheGathering.com

data.name: Chandra's Ignition
data.oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.
data.flavor_text: In the moment before her execution, she realized what it meant to be a pyromancer, to be alive, to be Chandra.

data.name: Cinderclasm
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Cinderclasm deals 1 damage to each creature. If it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to each creature instead.
data.flavor_text: Every inferno begins with a spark.

data.name: Citywide Bust
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text:
"Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

data.name: Claws of Wirewood
data.oracle_text:
Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: They say the forest has eyes. They never mention its claws.

data.name: Cleanse
data.oracle_text: Destroy all black creatures.
data.flavor_text: The clouds broke and the sun's rays burst forth; each foul beast in its turn faltered, and was gone.

data.name: Cleansing Nova
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
data.flavor_text: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.

data.name: Cleansing Nova
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
data.flavor_text: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.

data.name: Cloudkill
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text: As the acrid fumes drifted through the Lower City, even the vermin ceased to stir.

data.name: Collision of Realms
data.oracle_text: Each player shuffles all creatures they own into their library. Each player who shuffled a nontoken creature into their library this way reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card, then puts that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order.

data.name: Conductive Current
data.oracle_text: Conductive Current deals 3 damage to each creature. Choose an instant or sorcery card in your hand. It perpetually gains "If this spell would deal noncombat damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 instead."

data.name: Consume the Meek
data.oracle_text: Destroy each creature with mana value 3 or less. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"Others ask why the Eldrazi destroy. I ask why they preserve."
—Ganda, Goma Fada deserter

data.name: Consume the Meek
data.oracle_text: Destroy each creature with mana value 3 or less. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"Why does it destroy? It does, and to talk of reasons wastes time and breath."
—Nirthu, lone missionary

data.name: Corpse Explosion
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Corpse Explosion deals damage equal to the exiled card's power to each creature and each planeswalker.
data.flavor_text:
"Well, that's one way to scatter her ashes."
—Calvey, funeral director

data.name: Corrosive Gale
data.oracle_text:
({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
Corrosive Gale deals X damage to each creature with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Wipe Sheoldred's spies from the sky. She'll see the result of our vision soon enough."
—Glissa

data.name: Cosmotronic Wave
data.oracle_text: Cosmotronic Wave deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.
data.flavor_text: "This sort of innovation occurs when you set out to improve an electric tea kettle and misplace a decimal."

data.name: Cower in Fear
data.oracle_text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"You will fully understand fear when you discover it is the final thing you put your faith in."
—Nicol Bolas

data.name: Crippling Fear
data.oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Creatures that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Panic spread like wildfire as the demons of Immersturm poured into Bretagard, slaughtering as they came.

data.name: Crush the Weak
data.oracle_text:
Crush the Weak deals 2 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

data.name: Crux of Fate
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
data.flavor_text: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.

data.name: Crux of Fate
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"One brother fought for the sake of the Multiverse. The other for himself."
—*The Elderspell Parable*

data.name: Cry of the Carnarium
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: If your ears bleed, it's a party. If your eyes bleed, it's a Rakdos party.

data.name: Culling Sun
data.oracle_text: Destroy each creature with mana value 3 or less.
data.flavor_text:
"Who truly runs this city? Look to the sky on hallowed days, and see whose sigil is stamped clearly onto the heavens."
—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

data.name: Dakmor Plague
data.oracle_text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

data.name: Damn
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
Overload {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

data.name: Damnation
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

data.name: Damnation
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: Their bodies rotted, their bones splintered, and their souls frayed to tatters. Only then were they granted the mercy of death.

data.name: Damnation
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: All deeds once committed, repaid now in kind.

data.name: Damnation
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

data.name: Damnation
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

data.name: Damning Verdict
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with no counters on them.
data.flavor_text: "Guilty as charged!"

data.name: Day of Judgment
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"I have seen planes leveled and all life rendered to dust. It brought no pleasure, even to a heart as dark as mine."
—Sorin Markov

data.name: Day of Judgment
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"This must not become common knowledge. The consequences of such a spell are too great. Lock it away in the restricted archive, and destroy its record in the catalog."
—Director Taiva, to Isabough

data.name: Day of Judgment
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures.

data.name: Day of Judgment
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"I have seen planes leveled and all life rendered to dust. It brought no pleasure, even to a heart as dark as mine."
—Sorin Markov

data.name: Deadly Tempest
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.
data.flavor_text: When the winds blow out of the abyss, death is the only harvest.

data.name: Dead of Winter
data.oracle_text: All nonsnow creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of snow permanents you control.
data.flavor_text:
"At last, silence."
—Tevesh Szat

data.name: Deafening Clarion
data.oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Deafening Clarion deals 3 damage to each creature.
• Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Commander, what's the signal to attack?"
"You'll know."

data.name: Death Cloud
data.oracle_text: Each player loses X life, discards X cards, sacrifices X creatures, then sacrifices X lands.
data.flavor_text: The swarm's million wings stir the foulest of breezes.

data.name: Death Frenzy
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text: The crocodiles' putrid jaws swallow everything but the screams.

data.name: Decree of Annihilation
data.oracle_text:
Exile all artifacts, creatures, and lands from the battlefield, all cards from all graveyards, and all cards from all hands.
Cycling {5}{R}{R} ({5}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Annihilation, destroy all lands.

data.name: Decree of Pain
data.oracle_text:
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

data.name: Decree of Pain
data.oracle_text:
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

data.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
data.oracle_text:
Delayed Blast Fireball deals 2 damage to each opponent and each creature they control. If this spell was cast from exile, it deals 5 damage to each opponent and each creature they control instead.
Foretell {4}{R}{R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

data.name: Depopulate
data.oracle_text: Each player who controls a multicolored creature draws a card. Then destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text: No screams rang out. No blood stained the streets. In an instant, the bustling metropolis simply fell silent.

data.name: Descend upon the Sinful
data.oracle_text:
Exile all creatures.
Delirium — Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
data.flavor_text: Above the cries, a phrase rang out: "You will all be saved."

data.name: Desert Sandstorm
data.oracle_text: Desert Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text: While pursuing the remnants of Yuan Shao's forces into the Wuhan Desert, Cao Cao was temporarily turned back by a fierce sandstorm.

data.name: Destructive Force
data.oracle_text: Each player sacrifices five lands. Destructive Force deals 5 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text: The end of the world rarely comes quietly.

data.name: Devastate
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. Devastate deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"You're willing to die for your homeland. I'm willing to kill for it."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

data.name: Devastating Dreams
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards at random.
Each player sacrifices X lands. Devastating Dreams deals X damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text: Kamahl dreams of storms of fire.

data.name: Devastation
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures and lands.
data.flavor_text: There is much talk about the art of creation. What about the art of destruction?

data.name: Disaster Radius
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's mana value.

data.name: Disorder
data.oracle_text: Disorder deals 2 damage to each white creature and each player who controls a white creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Fire hurts them almost as much as the chaos that follows. Almost."
—The Western Paladin

data.name: Disorder
data.oracle_text: Disorder deals 2 damage to each white creature and each player who controls a white creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Then, just when the other guys were winnin', the sky threw up."
—Jula, goblin raider

data.name: Divine Reckoning
data.oracle_text:
Each player chooses a creature they control. Destroy the rest.
Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: Survival of the purest.

data.name: Doomskar
data.oracle_text:
Destroy all creatures.
Foretell {1}{W}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
data.flavor_text: The realms crashed together, with Bretagard at the center of the calamity.

data.name: Do or Die
data.oracle_text: Separate all creatures target player controls into two piles. Destroy all creatures in the pile of that player's choice. They can't be regenerated.

data.name: Draconic Intervention
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
Draconic Intervention deals X damage to each non-Dragon creature, where X is the exiled card's mana value. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Exile Draconic Intervention.

data.name: Drown in Sorrow
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
data.flavor_text:
"The sad truth is that the whip of Erebos is long enough to wrap around all our throats."
—Perisophia the philosopher

data.name: Drown in Sorrow
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

data.name: Dry Spell
data.oracle_text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: A fist of dust to line your throat, a bowl of sand to fill your belly.

data.name: Dry Spell
data.oracle_text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Wherever water is lacking, all things suffer."
—Autumn Willow

data.name: Dry Spell
data.oracle_text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"My soul thirsts for Serra's salvation, as does my body for life's breath."
—Ihsan's Shade

data.name: Duneblast
data.oracle_text: Choose up to one creature. Destroy the rest.
data.flavor_text: The Abzan turn to this spell only as a last resort, for its inevitable result is what they most dread: to be alone.

data.name: Dwarven Catapult
data.oracle_text: Dwarven Catapult deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among all creatures target opponent controls.
data.flavor_text:
"Often greatly outnumbered in battle, Dwarves relied on catapults as one means of damaging a large army."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV*

data.oracle_text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

data.oracle_text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

data.oracle_text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

data.name: Electrickery
data.oracle_text:
Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

data.name: Endemic Plague
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy all creatures that share a creature type with the sacrificed creature. They can't be regenerated.

data.name: End Hostilities
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures and all permanents attached to creatures.
data.flavor_text: Her palm flared like the eye of a waking dragon. Then all was calm.

data.name: End the Festivities
data.oracle_text: End the Festivities deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.
data.flavor_text: When the defenses around Lurenbraum Fortress faltered, the Crimson Ballroom received some unexpected guests.

data.name: Engulf the Shore
data.oracle_text: Return to their owners' hands all creatures with toughness less than or equal to the number of Islands you control.
data.flavor_text:
"The tides have begun to ignore the moon."
—Tamiyo's journal

data.name: Essence Pulse
data.oracle_text: You gain 2 life. Each creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"There is nothing so invigorating and stubbornly belligerent as the pure energy of life."
—Valentin, Witherbloom dean

data.name: Evacuation
data.oracle_text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
data.flavor_text:
"Once I supply the breeze, you'll see your warriors for the smoke they truly are."
—Alexi, zephyr mage

data.name: Evacuation
data.oracle_text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
data.flavor_text:
"How many people can you save in that thing?"
"All of them," replied the mage with a smile.

data.name: Evacuation
data.oracle_text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
data.flavor_text: The first step of every exodus is from the blood and the fire onto the trail.

data.name: Evaporate
data.oracle_text: Evaporate deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature.
data.flavor_text:
"The body is a temple with a foundation of sand."
—Autumn Willow

data.name: Evincar's Justice
data.oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

data.name: Extinction
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures of the creature type of your choice.
data.flavor_text:
"I once had an entire race killed just to listen to the rattling of their dried bones as I waded through them."
—Volrath

data.name: Extinction Event
data.oracle_text: Choose odd or even. Exile each creature with mana value of the chosen quality. (Zero is even.)
data.flavor_text:
"Nature is more merciless than any hunter I've ever known."
—Zai, nightsquad captain

data.name: Extinguish All Hope
data.oracle_text: Destroy all nonenchantment creatures.
data.flavor_text: Phenax offers the hope of life, while Pharika grants the solace of death. Between them stands Erebos, who promises nothing but eternity.

data.name: Eyeblight Massacre
data.oracle_text: Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"I've already seen so much evil, so much darkness. Why do you insist on adding more?"
—Nissa Revane, to Dwynen

data.name: Ezuri's Predation
data.oracle_text: For each creature your opponents control, create a 4/4 green Phyrexian Beast creature token. Each of those tokens fights a different one of those creatures.
data.flavor_text: "Those who do not submit will be consumed."

data.name: Falling Star
data.oracle_text: Flip Falling Star onto the playing area from a height of at least one foot. Falling Star deals 3 damage to each creature it lands on. Tap all creatures dealt damage by Falling Star. If Falling Star doesn't turn completely over at least once during the flip, it has no effect.

data.name: Famine
data.oracle_text: Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Better to starve to death than be bored to death."
—Liliana Vess

data.name: Famine
data.oracle_text: Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: "But it was a year of dearth. People were reduced to eating leaves of jujube trees. Corpses were seen everywhere in the countryside."

data.name: Farewell
data.oracle_text:
Choose one or more —
• Exile all artifacts.
• Exile all creatures.
• Exile all enchantments.
• Exile all graveyards.

data.name: Farewell
data.oracle_text:
Choose one or more —
• Exile all artifacts.
• Exile all creatures.
• Exile all enchantments.
• Exile all graveyards.

data.name: Fated Retribution
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures and planeswalkers. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

data.name: Fault Line
data.oracle_text: Fault Line deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.
data.flavor_text:
We live on the serpent's back.
—Viashino saying

data.name: Feast of Succession
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn. You become the monarch.
data.flavor_text:
"Beware the eager host."
—Eligeth, crossroads augur

data.name: Fell the Mighty
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.
data.flavor_text:
"They had it coming."
—Squire Imalia, savior of Thiswick

data.name: Festergloom
data.oracle_text: Nonblack creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The death of a scout can be as informative as a safe return.

data.name: Festering March
data.oracle_text:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Exile Festering March with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{B} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

data.name: Fiery Cannonade
data.oracle_text: Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.
data.flavor_text: Wary of the ferocious dinosaurs, the Legion of Dusk built up the walls of their fort—just in time for the pirates to burn them down.

data.name: Fiery Confluence
data.oracle_text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature.
• Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent.
• Destroy target artifact.

data.name: Fiery Confluence
data.oracle_text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature.
• Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent.
• Destroy target artifact.

data.name: Fight to the Death
data.oracle_text: Destroy all blocking creatures and all blocked creatures.
data.flavor_text: When a battlefield falls silent, it's rarely due to a cease-fire.

data.name: Final Judgment
data.oracle_text: Exile all creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"The clashing warriors turned to face O-Kagachi, the greatest kami, and their sigh of awe was their last breath."
—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*

data.name: Final Revels
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• All creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• All creatures get -0/-2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: One whiff of the sweet, pungent scent leads to euphoria—or to an early grave.

data.name: Firespout
data.oracle_text: Firespout deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to cast this spell and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {R}{G} was spent.)

data.name: Firespout
data.oracle_text: Firespout deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to cast this spell and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {R}{G} was spent.)

data.name: Fire Tempest
data.oracle_text: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

data.name: Flamebreak
data.oracle_text: Flamebreak deals 3 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Creatures dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Now I'm thirsty."
—Korva, Vulshok battlemaster

data.name: Flames of the Raze-Boar
data.oracle_text: Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 4 damage to target creature an opponent controls. Then Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 2 damage to each other creature that player controls if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: "Fire will cure a multitude of ills."

data.name: Flame Sweep
data.oracle_text: Flame Sweep deals 2 damage to each creature except for creatures you control with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"I have calculated that a dragon in flight, in a single strafing run, can cover an area of—"
—Thaedus the Clever, last words

data.name: Flame Wave
data.oracle_text: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
data.flavor_text:
"I hear the roaring of a wave whose waters are red and whose mists are black."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

data.name: Flaying Tendrils
data.oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: Only one Eldrazi stood against them, yet the defenders were outnumbered.

data.name: Flaying Tendrils
data.oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: Only one Eldrazi stood against them, yet the defenders were outnumbered.

data.name: Flowstone Slide
data.oracle_text: All creatures get +X/-X until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: It may look like soil, but its nature is malice.

data.name: Forced March
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with mana value X or less.
data.flavor_text: The Caterans call it a screening process. The dead are in no condition to argue.

data.name: Fumigate
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. You gain 1 life for each creature destroyed this way.
data.flavor_text:
"Ghirapur's gremlin population poses a threat to the infrastructure of the fairgrounds. Threats must be eliminated."
—Sram, senior edificer

data.name: Gale Force
data.oracle_text: Gale Force deals 5 damage to each creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: Everything the kami had done, they did with more force. Gentle breezes became typhoons, rolling rivers turned to crushing rapids, and gentle growth became overnight masses of thorns and vines.

data.name: Gates Ablaze
data.oracle_text: Gates Ablaze deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of Gates you control.
data.flavor_text: When the Izzet's spirit of invention extends to the city's infrastructure, the results are sometimes explosive.

data.name: Golden Demise
data.oracle_text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, instead only creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.

data.name: Golgari Charm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Regenerate each creature you control.
data.flavor_text:
"Let the rest of Ravnica sneer. One way or another, they all end up in the undercity."
—Jarad

data.name: Gruul Charm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
• Gain control of all permanents you own.
• Gruul Charm deals 3 damage to each creature with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Not Gruul? Then die!"
—Borborygmos

data.name: Guan Yu's 1,000-Li March
data.oracle_text: Destroy all tapped creatures.
data.flavor_text: "He [Guan Yu] covered the ground on a thousand-*li* horse; / With dragon blade he took each pass by force."

data.name: Hail Storm
data.oracle_text: Hail Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and 1 damage to you and each creature you control.
data.flavor_text:
"If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

data.name: Hallowed Burial
data.oracle_text: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.
data.flavor_text:
"I'd rather hear the screams of battle than the quiet that follows."
—Talara, elvish safewright

data.name: Harsh Mercy
data.oracle_text: Each player chooses a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of a type chosen this way. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"There is no greater burden than choosing who to save."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

data.name: Hazardous Conditions
data.oracle_text: Creatures with no counters on them get -2/-2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "There are many reasons we invent, of which survival is not the least."

data.name: Hellfire
data.oracle_text: Destroy all nonblack creatures. Hellfire deals X plus 3 damage to you, where X is the number of creatures that died this way.
data.flavor_text: "High on a throne of royal state . . . insatiate to pursue vain war with heav'n." —John Milton, *Paradise Lost*

data.name: Hellion Eruption
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.
data.flavor_text: Just when you thought you'd be safe, in the middle of an open field with no Eldrazi around for miles.

data.name: Hideous Laughter
data.oracle_text:
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {3}{B}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)
